UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: A beta-defensin 1-like antimicrobial peptide from the tree shrew, Tupaia belangeri.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Dong L, Lv L, Yan X, Lai R, Liu R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:2% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=3.0µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=18.0µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 20032(MIC=24.0µg/ml),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MIC=24.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=12.0µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=12.0µg/ml)
